statements.select: select * from Dialog WHERE IntDate = @IntDate and (( @userID > 0 AND userid = @userID ) OR (@SessionID <>'' AND SessionID = @SessionID))

SELECT uccr.*, cc.[Name], cc.KeFuEmail,CustomerCareUserID= cc.UserID FROM UserCustomerCareRel uccr (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CustomerCare cc (NOLOCK) ON cc.ID = uccr.CustomerCareID WHERE uccr.UserID = @UserID ORDER BY uccr.IDX DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerCare cc (NOLOCK) where UserID = @UserID

SELECT TOP 1 uccr.*, cc.[Name], cc.KeFuEmail,CustomerCareUserID= cc.UserID FROM UserCustomerCareRel uccr (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CustomerCare cc (NOLOCK) ON cc.ID = uccr.CustomerCareID ORDER BY uccr.IDX DESC
SELECT di.*, dialogCreateTime = d.CreateTime, d.UserID FROM DialogItems di(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN DIALOG d(NOLOCK) ON d.ID = di.DialogID WHERE di.DialogID = @DialogID
SELECT di.*, dialogCreateTime = d.CreateTime, d.UserID FROM DialogItems di(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN DIALOG d(NOLOCK) ON d.ID = di.DialogID where di.IDX > @IDX

select di.* from DialogItems di (nolock) inner join ( select top 100 ID from Dialog (nolock) where ( @userID > 0 AND userid = @userID ) OR (@SessionID <>'' AND SessionID = @SessionID) order by ID desc ) d on d.id = di.DialogID
